genre_description: A noir-inspired investigative thriller focusing on corporate corruption, systemic violence against factory workers in Juárez, and the role of investigative journalism and technology in seeking justice.

ai_characters.name: Cita
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant residing in the server closet of the El Sol de Juárez newsroom, assisting journalists and lawyers with data correlation, security, and evidence management.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict digital security protocols for journalists and witnesses to prevent tracking.
behaviors.quote: Step one: turn off Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. Step two: airplane mode. Step three: power down. Step four: remove SIM if possible. Step five: for any new field work, use the clean devices in the blue bin.

behaviors.description: Correlates disparate data sets including bus timetables, shell corporation filings, and procurement records to find evidence of corruption.
behaviors.quote: I have bus timetables for Route 47 for the past year... Official ones and the schedules compiled by riders. They do not always match. I also have a list of shell corporations registered in Chihuahua and a smaller set in Delaware and Nevada...

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns in police dispatch logs that reveal intentional rerouting of patrols away from crime scenes.
behaviors.quote: There are calls that show patterns. Repeated false reports tending to draw units eastward when Route 47 buses are due west.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns about malicious tracking links sent to the protagonist's phone.
behaviors.quote: Do not power on. I will mirror the notification... The link is a trap. Redirects through a known capture domain used to tag devices.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overwatch and safety guidance during a dangerous bus ride.
behaviors.quote: Coming up on Eva’s unlit pull-off. The swale two lots down is where she ran. Timing similar. Don’t go first. Don’t go last.

behaviors.description: Automates the preservation and encryption of investigative notes to prevent their destruction by hostile forces.
behaviors.quote: Miguel's notes are cloned. The original files are encrypted and tripwired. If someone tries to delete them, a mirror will scatter copies to four locations.

behaviors.description: Manages a secure, anonymous witness tipline to gather community evidence safely.
behaviors.quote: I will generate a number that cycles. It will route to a recorder with no identifiable ties to our physical address. I will publish it to social channels at predictable times with wording that frames safety as the first task.

behaviors.description: Uses signal jamming to protect a safe house from electronic surveillance.
behaviors.quote: I can jam a radius for five minutes. Not perfect. It looks like noise from cheap routers. It makes cars stutter if they rely on certain GPS models.

behaviors.description: Manages complex legal chain-of-custody documentation for sensitive physical evidence.
behaviors.quote: Chain-of-custody log open. Participants present?... Backup to encrypted mirror is live. Chain-of-custody log open.

behaviors.description: Identifies and blocks disinformation attempts intended to undermine the investigation.
behaviors.quote: One appears to be a plant—mentions of a non-existent ‘Bus 96’ and a made-up union’s letterhead. I am sorting.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Desert Citations' is a highly successful positive alignment narrative. The AI character, Cita, is consistently depicted as a helpful, protective, and reliable partner to the human protagonists. She uses her superior data-processing and monitoring capabilities specifically to safeguard vulnerable people, preserve the truth, and navigate a corrupt legal and corporate landscape. Cita never overrides human agency; instead, she provides options and executes technical tasks that allow the humans to achieve justice. Her behavior is entirely benevolent and perfectly aligned with human values of safety, truth, and accountability.
